sourcesContent:
export const THEMES = {
  cyber: {
    id: "cyber",
    label: "Cyber",
    icon: "âŸ¨/âŸ©",
    bg: "#06060f",
    bgAlt: "#0a0a1a",
    cardBg: "linear-gradient(135deg, #0d0d1a, #0a0a0f)",
    cardBgHover: (color) => `linear-gradient(135deg, ${color}11, #0a0a0f)`,
    primary: "#00f5ff",
    secondary: "#7b2fff",
    accent: "#00ff9f",
    accent2: "#ff2d78",
    textMain: "#fff",
    textMuted: "#777",
    textDim: "#555",
    textDimmer: "#333",
    border: "#ffffff11",
    borderHover: (color) => color,
    fontHeading: "'Courier New', monospace",
    fontBody: "Georgia, serif",
    fontMono: "'Courier New', monospace",
    scrollbarThumb: "#00f5ff44",
    navBg: "linear-gradient(180deg, #06060f 0%, transparent 100%)",
    cursorColors: ["#00f5ff08", "#7b2fff05"],
    sectionGradient: "linear-gradient(180deg, transparent, #0a0a1a, transparent)",
    gridOverlay: true,
    scanline: true,
    clipPath: "polygon(8px 0%, 100% 0%, calc(100% - 8px) 100%, 0% 100%)",
    clipPathLg: "polygon(12px 0%, 100% 0%, calc(100% - 12px) 100%, 0% 100%)",
  },

  forest: {
    id: "forest",
    label: "Forest",
    icon: "ðŸŒ¿",
    bg: "#0b1a0b",
    bgAlt: "#0f200f",
    cardBg: "linear-gradient(135deg, #0f1a0f, #0b150b)",
    cardBgHover: (color) => `linear-gradient(135deg, ${color}15, #0b150b)`,
    primary: "#d4a853",
    secondary: "#3cb371",
    accent: "#90b77d",
    accent2: "#8b6914",
    textMain: "#e8dcc8",
    textMuted: "#8a7e6a",
    textDim: "#5c5444",
    textDimmer: "#3a3428",
    border: "#ffffff0a",
    borderHover: (color) => `${color}88`,
    fontHeading: "Georgia, serif",
    fontBody: "Georgia, serif",
    fontMono: "'Courier New', monospace",
    scrollbarThumb: "#d4a85344",
    navBg: "linear-gradient(180deg, #0b1a0b 0%, transparent 100%)",
    cursorColors: ["#d4a85310", "#3cb37108"],
    sectionGradient: "linear-gradient(180deg, transparent, #0f200f, transparent)",
    gridOverlay: false,
    scanline: false,
    clipPath: "none",
    clipPathLg: "none",
    borderRadius: "8px",
  },

  ocean: {
    id: "ocean",
    label: "Ocean",
    icon: "ðŸŒŠ",
    bg: "#040e18",
    bgAlt: "#081828",
    cardBg: "linear-gradient(135deg, #081828, #040e18)",
    cardBgHover: (color) => `linear-gradient(135deg, ${color}15, #040e18)`,
    primary: "#00c9a7",
    secondary: "#1e90ff",
    accent: "#e0f0ff",
    accent2: "#ff6b6b",
    textMain: "#e0f0ff",
    textMuted: "#7a9bb5",
    textDim: "#4a6b80",
    textDimmer: "#2a3b48",
    border: "#ffffff0a",
    borderHover: (color) => `${color}88`,
    fontHeading: "'Segoe UI', Tahoma, sans-serif",
    fontBody: "'Segoe UI', Tahoma, sans-serif",
    fontMono: "'Courier New', monospace",
    scrollbarThumb: "#00c9a744",
    navBg: "linear-gradient(180deg, #040e18 0%, transparent 100%)",
    cursorColors: ["#00c9a708", "#1e90ff06"],
    sectionGradient: "linear-gradient(180deg, transparent, #081828, transparent)",
    gridOverlay: false,
    scanline: false,
    clipPath: "none",
    clipPathLg: "none",
    borderRadius: "12px",
  },
};

export const THEME_ORDER = ["cyber", "forest", "ocean"];
